summary: Partial implementation of payment gating and admin features. Landing page payment/contact information (REQ-3, REQ-4) fully implemented. Contact Card page (REQ-6) created. Payment gate component exists but unpaid user blocking at login level (REQ-2) is incomplete. Admin panel with payment toggles (REQ-1) and backend admin principal storage (REQ-5) not evident in diff. New Entry page (REQ-7) and LeaderBoard ranking (REQ-8) not visible in truncated diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create admin panel page that displays all users in a table with their current payment status (paid/unpaid) and provides toggle switches to change each user's payment status between paid and unpaid
missing_requirements.reason: AdminPayment route exists in App.tsx but the actual AdminPayment.tsx page content is not in the diff summary. Cannot verify if it displays users in a table with payment status toggles.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement authentication gate that blocks unpaid users from logging in and displays exact error message with payment instructions
missing_requirements.reason: PaymentGate component is referenced in AppShell.tsx and shows gate for unpaid users, but the exact error message specified in requirements is not confirmed in the truncated diff. Unclear if blocking happens at login attempt or after authentication.

missing_requirements.requirement: Store and display admin principal ID (i67ts-e55ut-cg7iv-w4qa6-f63qo-pgevo-7zqec-cevgk-5nm7d-xjryz-mae) in backend for access control and admin identification
missing_requirements.reason: Backend main.mo is truncated and does not show where the specific admin principal ID is hardcoded or stored. The isAdminCaller() method is referenced but implementation not visible in diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create New Entry page allowing users to input NFL Combine statistics for all standard combine drills with notes field for additional context
missing_requirements.reason: NewEntry route exists in App.tsx but the actual NewEntry.tsx page content is not in the diff summary. Cannot verify if it includes all standard combine drills and notes field.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement basic LeaderBoard page that displays all users ranked by their combine performance with ranking from #1 to lowest, showing key performance metrics for each user
missing_requirements.reason: Published route exists (mapped to leaderboard) but the actual Published.tsx page content is not in the diff summary. Cannot verify ranking implementation or display of all users with metrics.
